naughty.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a naughty child does not obey adults and behaves badly
naughty.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: You’re a very naughty boy! Look what you’ve done!
naughty.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if an adult does something naughty, they do something that is not right or good, but is not very serious
naughty.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: I felt a bit naughty going off on my own, leaving the children behind.
